attributes.action: Initiate a full disclosure project and release members of the secret intelligence services from their security oaths
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Absolve serving members of the military and secret security services from their security oaths so they can reveal secret technologies that would free us from the need to use fossil fuels. We need a disclosure project on this subject in the UK that mirrors the aims and goals of Dr Steven Greers the disclosure project in the USA.

Google the disclosure project for more information people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
